body_html:
To be clear, I think you're referring to this:

  • google seq2seq
  • nmt
  • tensorflow seq2seq

They are all reference implementations similar to what was described here. You may use them to do your own research. Hope they help!

/CC @zffchen78 @ebrevdo

nmt

body:
To be clear, I think you're referring to this:
* [google seq2seq](https://github.com/google/seq2seq)
* [nmt](https://github.com/tensorflow/nmt)
* tensorflow [seq2seq](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/seq2seq)

They are all reference implementations similar to what was described [here](https://research.google.com/pubs/pub45610.html). You may use them to do your own research. Hope they help!

/CC @zffchen78 @ebrevdo
